amendment.description: An amendment numbered 9 printed in House Report 115-830 to increase funding by $2 million for Historic Preservation Fund grants to Historically Black Colleges and Universities.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Clyburn amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A008) offered by Mr. Clyburn.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Clyburn amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.
